books.title: Atomic Habit
books.author: James Clear
books.description: Focuses on building good habits and breaking bad ones using small, consistent improvements. Explains how tiny changes compound into remarkable results over time.

books.title: The-Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A symbolic story about a shepherd named Santiago pursuing his dreams. Emphasizes following one’s “Personal Legend” and listening to the heart.

books.title: Think and Grow Rich
books.author: Napoleon Hill
books.description: Based on principles of success gathered from wealthy individuals. Highlights mindset

books.title: Steve Jobs
books.author: Walter Isaacson
books.description: The exclusive biography of the creative entrepreneur who revolutionized industries.

books.title: You Can Win
books.author: Shiv Khera
books.description: Practical guide to building positive attitude, character, and leadership skills. Focuses on ethics, confidence, and goal-setting.

books.title: Zero to One
books.author: Peter Thiel
books.description: Discusses how to create innovative startups that build something truly new (“0 to 1”). Emphasizes monopoly thinking and unique value creation.
